content:
Amir M. Rahmani

Assistant Professor
University of California, Irvine

  • About
  • Publications
  • Projects
  • Teaching
  • Students
  • Professional Services
  • Honors
  • Contact

Professional Services

Journal Editorial Board:

  • Associate Editor of the ACM Transactions on Computing for Healthcare (ACM HEALTH).
  • Associate Editor of the International Journal of Big Data Analytics in Healthcare (IGI-Global IJBDAH).
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Enabling Technologies in Health Engineering and Informatics for the New Revolution of Healthcare 4.0 in the IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics (JBHI, IF: 3.85). (CFP)
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare: Transforming healthcare through innovations in mobile and wireless technologies in the ACM/Springer Mobile Networks & Applications Journal (MONET, IF: 3.265). (CFP)
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Selected Papers from 7th International Conference on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare in the Sensors Journal (IF: 2.677). (CFP)
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Internet-of-Things and Big Data for Smarter Healthcare: From Device to Architecture, Applications and Analytics in the Elsevier Journal of Future Generation Computer Systems (FGCS).
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Energy Efficient Multi-Core and Many-Core Systems in the Elsevier Journal of Parallel and Distributed Computing.
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Soft Computing for Big Data in the Elsevier Journal of Applied Soft Computing.
  • Guest Editor of the Special Issue on Advances in Methods for Adaptive Multicore Systems in the Springer Journal of Supercomputing.
  • Editorial Review Board of the International Journal of Embedded and Real-Time Communication Systems (IGI-Global IJERTCS).
  • Editorial Review Board of the International Sensors Journal (Sensors).

Conference Organization:

  • Track Chair of the Bio and Wearable Design Track of the 33th International Conference on VLSI Design (VLSID'19).
  • General Chair of the 2019 International Workshop on Deep Learning on Edge for Smart Health and Wellbeing Applications in conjuction with ACM/IEEE Conference on Connected Health-CHASE'19 (EdgeDL'19).
  • General Chair of the 2018 International Workshop on Deep Learning and Edge Computing in IoT-centered Health Applications in conjuction with ACM/IEEE Conference on Connected Health-CHASE'18 (DL-EDGE-IoT'18).
  • Chair of the Hot Topic Special Session on Self-aware Systems: Concepts and Applications at IEEE/ACM Design Automation and Test in Europe Conference (DATE'17).
  • Publications Chair of Springer/EAI International Conference on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare (MobiHealth'17).
  • Tutorials Chair of Springer/EAI International Conference on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare (MobiHealth'17).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Multi-Core and Many-Core systems for EMbedded Computing in conjunction with 24th IEEE/Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed, and Network-Based Processing (MC3-PDP'16).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Internet-of-Things for Healthcare: Smart Architectures, Applications, and Microsystems in conjunction with ACM International Conference on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare (IoT4Health-MobiHealth'15).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Energy Efficient Reconfigurable Many-Core Systems in conjunction with IEEE 10th International Symposium on Reconfigurable Communication-centric Systems-on-Chip (ReCoSoC'15).
  • Chair of the Special Session on On-chip Communication Architectures for Multi-Core and Many-Core systems (OCA-MC) in conjunction with IEEE 9th International Symposium on Embedded Multicore/Many-core Systems-on-Chip (MCSoC'15).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Multi-Core and Many-Core systems for EMbedded Computing in conjunction with 23rd IEEE/Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed, and Network-Based Processing (MC3-PDP'15).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Current Trends in Wearable Technologies, Body Sensor Networks and Internet-of-Things enabling Pervasive Healthcare in conjunction with International Conference on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare (BSN-MobiHealth'14).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Multi-Core and Many-Core systems for EMbedded Computing in conjunction with 22nd IEEE/Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed, and Network-Based Processing (MC3-PDP'14).
  • Publicity Chair of the 2013 International Conference on High Performance Computing & Simulation (HPCSâ€™13).
  • Chair of the Special Session on Dynamic and Reliable Multicore Systems in conjunction with 21st IEEE/Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed, and Network-Based Processing (DaRMuS-PDP'13).
  • Chair of the 2012 International Workshop on Design, Analysis and Tools for Integrated Circuits and Systems hosted by the IEEE International Conference on Networked Embedded Systems for Every Application (DATICS-NESEA'12).
  • General Chair of the 2012 International Workshop on Design, Analysis and Tools for Integrated Circuits and Systems hosted by the 9th IFIP International Conference on Network and Parallel Computing (DATICS-NPC'12).
  • General Chair of the 2012 International Workshop on Design, Analysis and Tools for Integrated Circuits and Systems hosted by the IEEE Baltic Conference on Future Internet Communications (DATICS-BCFIC'12).

Technical Program Committee:

  • IEEE/ACM Design Automation and Test in Europe Conference (DATE'18, '19).
  • IEEE Computer Society Annual Symposium on VLSI (ISVLSI'19).
  • IEEE International Conference on VLSI Design (VLSID'19).
  • ACM Great Lakes Symposium on VLSI (GLSVLSI'18, '19).
  • IEEE/ACM Symposium on Embedded Systems for Real-Time Multimedia (ESTIMedia'17).
  • IEEE Consumer Communications & Networking Conference (CCNC'18).
  • IEEE International Conference on Fog and Mobile Edge Computing (FMEC'17).
  • IEEE International Symposium on Defect and Fault Tolerance in VLSI and Nanotechnology Systems (DFTS'16, '17).
  • IEEE Symposium On Big Data Analytics for IoT Healthcare 2017
  • IEEE Workshop on Low-Power Dependable Computing (LPDC'16).
  • ACM Workshop on Middleware for Edge Clouds & Cloudlets (MECC'16).
  • Springer/EAI International Conference on Sensor Systems and Software (S-CUBE'15, '16).
  • IEEE Nordic Circuits and Systems Conference (NORCAS'15, '16).
  • IEEE Sensors Applications Symposium (SAS'15, '16, '17).
  • IEEE/Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed, and Network-Based Processing (PDP'11, '12, '13, '14, '15, '16, '17).
  • Springer/EAI International Conference on Wireless Mobile Communication and Healthcare (MobiHealth'14, '15, '16, '17).
  • International Symposium on Computer Architecture & Digital Systems (CADS'13 and '15).
  • International Symposium on System-on-Chip 2014 (ISSoC'14).
  • IEEE International Symposium on Embedded Multicore/Many-core Systems-on-Chip (MCSoC'14, '15, and '16).
  • IEEE International Conference on Embedded Software and Systems (ICESS'12).
  • IEEE International Conference on Networked Embedded Systems for Enterprise Applications (NESEA'11 & '12).
  • IEEE International Workshop on Dynamic Reconfigurable Network-on-Chip (DRNoC'12).
  • ACM International Workshop on Network on Chip Architectures (NoCArc'12).
  • IEEE International MultiConference of Engineers and Computer Scientists (DATICS-IMECS'12).
  • IEEE/Euromicro Track on Management and Reconfiguration of Embedded Systems at Euromicro Conference on Digital System Design (MaRS-DSD'13).
  • IEEE/Euromicro Track on On-Chip Parallel and Network-Based Systems (OCPNBS'12).
